>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

 @Icon[type:photon] Photon Revelation

While the sun can sear and burn, it also represents a gentler force of growth and redemption. As a move action, you can grant a weapon you wield, including your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.WWHUAfgpvk6uIgY0]{Solar Weapon}, the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#nonlethal]{nonlethal} weapon special property by sheathing it in a field of cushioning energy. This lasts for 1 round or until you leave photon mode.

When you are attuned or fully attuned, your weapon gains the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj.JournalEntryPage.zOJ86MDq6kNzAAbB#staggered]{Staggered} critical hit effect. If the weapon already has a critical hit effect, when you score a critical hit, you can apply either the weaponâ€™s normal critical hit effect or the staggered effect.
